titleStmt.title: Saint Peters path to the ioyes of heauen wherein is described the frailtie of flesh, the power of the spirit, the labyrinth of this life, Sathans subtilitie, and the soules saluation. As also the election, liues and martyrdomes, of the twelue Apostles. By W.B.
Saint Peters path to the joyes of heaven.
titleStmt.author: Broxup, William.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
